title: F-droid Thunderbird ver. 10
content: Why does F-droid have version 10 & Play Store has version 9?
creator: L8mith1

title: temporarily disable account
content:
Suggestion: add a feature to allow Thunderbird to disable checking an account.

I have several Thunderbird accounts. Some of them need to be checked maybe once a month. Would like to disable those until I manually initiate a connection.
creator: hspindel
